sentences.en: A group of Australian sea lions relax and frolic in a sea grass meadow near Little Hopkins Island South Australia.
sentences.cn: 一群澳大利亚海狮在海草草甸中休憩、嬉戏，是在澳大利亚南部的小霍普金斯岛附近拍的。

sentences.en: Between games, enjoy watching your pet frolic on the beach with everything you've purchased.
sentences.cn: 游戏之间, 享受看着你的宠物猴在沙滩上玩你购买的东西.

sentences.en: Boys as young as four or five tell more jokes, frolic and clown about while girls tend to be the ones doing the laughing.
sentences.cn: 男孩子在四五岁的时候就能够讲很多笑话，嬉戏或者扮小丑，女孩子这个时候通常还只会笑。

sentences.en: Everyone joined in the Saturday night frolics.
sentences.cn: 大家都参加了星期六晚上的欢乐聚会。

sentences.en: Frolic in the breeze all day.
sentences.cn: 每天都在春风中嬉戏.

sentences.en: Frolic Picture 2006 Contemporary Art of China Invitation Exhibition.
sentences.cn: “嬉戏的图像”2006中国当代艺术邀请展.

sentences.en: I hope frolic songs are always round you and bring you endless happiness. Merry!
sentences.cn: 愿欢乐的歌声,时刻萦绕着你,使你的人生充满幸福喜悦,永浴与无尽的欢乐年华. 祝圣诞快乐!

sentences.en: It was nothing but a frolic.
sentences.cn: 这只不过游戏而已.

sentences.en: Knights joust and frolic.
sentences.cn: 骑士们骑马比武，嬉戏作乐。

sentences.en: Lambs frolicked in the next field.
sentences.cn: 小羊在一旁的田野里嬉戏。

sentences.en: New ideas of festivity or frolic, theatricals or other entertainments, found in him a ready patron, and with his help would flourish and find fruition.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢支持各种与节庆或嬉戏、戏剧或其它娱乐有关的新思想。 这类思想在他的帮助下就会开花结果。

sentences.en: Skylark [ to frolic ].
sentences.cn: skylark的 简写 [ 戏闹 ].

sentences.en: The children are having a frolic before bedtime.
sentences.cn: 孩子们睡觉前正在嬉戏玩闹.

sentences.en: The children are having a frolic on the lawn.
sentences.cn: 孩子们正在草地上嬉戏玩耍.

sentences.en: The children had a frolic before bedtime.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在睡觉前玩一会儿.

sentences.en: The gloom he was feeling gave way to frolic.
sentences.cn: 他心头的愁闷都被欢乐代替了.

sentences.en: Their frolic in the surf threatened to become ugly.
sentences.cn: 他们在冲浪过程中的嬉闹有变得粗俗的危险.

sentences.en: Their relationship is never short on fun and frolic.
sentences.cn: 他们在一起少不了欢乐和嬉戏。

sentences.en: They had a frolic in the country.
sentences.cn: 他们在乡村度过了一段欢乐的时光.

sentences.en: Tourists sunbathe and frolic in the ocean.
sentences.cn: 游客晒着日光浴在海水里嬉戏。

trans.tran_en: a fun enjoyable game or activity
to play in an active happy way
